tool_description: FaceRect is a powerful and free API for face detection. It finds faces (both frontal and profile) on the image specified by URL or uploaded as a file and is able to find multiple faces on a single photo, producing JSON output with a bounding box for each face found. Check out visual demo here: http://apicloud.me/apis/facerect/demo/. Note that additionally FaceRect can find face features for each detected face (eyes, nose and mouth). For more precise face feature detection please see our FaceMark API: https://www.mashape.com/apicloud/facemark
name: FaceRect
title: FaceRect

api_list.name: Process Image URL
api_list.description: Returns a JSON object that contains detected faces for the image specified by URL  (visual demo: http://apicloud.me/apis/facerect/demo/)

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of the image you would like to find faces on. For supported image files and limitations please refer to the documentation: http://apicloud.me/apis/facerect/docs

optional_parameters.name: features
optional_parameters.description: Specifies if you need to find face features (eyes, nose and mouth) or just faces. If set to "true", the API will search for face features within faces detected (for frontal faces only). Default value is "false". For more information please refer to the documentation: http://apicloud.me/apis/facerect/docs
